title: Warm egg salad
ingredients: ['1 stick celery, thinly sliced', '3-4 leaves romaine lettuce, chopped', '1 carrot, shaved with a vegetable peeler', '5-8 green beans, topped, tailed and chopped', '4 small mushrooms, peeled and chopped', '1 handful olives', 'soy sauce, to drizzle', 'butter or oil, as needed', '2 eggs']
